meanings.definition: The practice of commuting to work or school in a shared van with a group of people.
meanings.sent1: Vanpooling is a cost-effective way to travel to work with others.
meanings.sent2: We organized a vanpooling group to save money on our daily commute.
meanings.sent3: The vanpooling crew always had fun singing together on their way to work.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of cars, the vanpooling van stood out as a beacon of teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The concept of vanpooling revolutionized how we think about commuting.

meanings.definition: The act of traveling in a van with a group of individuals to a common destination.
meanings.sent1: Vanpooling ensures everyone arrives at the office together.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the scenic views during our vanpooling trip to the concert.
meanings.sent3: The vanpooling adventure turned into a spontaneous karaoke session.
meanings.sent4: Their vanpooling journey was a shared experience of laughter and stories.
meanings.sent5: The vanpooling arrangement made the daily commute more enjoyable.
